title: The Elvin Realm: Dream Warriors
description: In the tradition of young adult fantasy, a wonderful adventure begins in an outer realm threatened by evil. The Elvin Realm: Dream Warriors is the first installment of a fantasy-based series about Tom, Rachel, and Scott Morgan and the adventures they have with their neighborhood friends in an outer dimension inhabited by Elves. New author, Linda Dawda, creates an exciting world of dinosaur-sized monsters, fairies, and Elvin enemy creatures. In the midst of the nearly constant action that will certainly be a draw for the young audience that the story caters to, the author manages to slip in messages about loyalty and personal integrity. For young adult readers: ages 9 to adultAuthor signed 1st edition.
author: Linda Dawda
